turns.userPrompt:
Implement task status management:
- Backend: Add status field (todo, in_progress, done) with validation
- API endpoint to update task status: PATCH /tasks/:id/status
- Frontend: Task board view with 3 columns (Todo, In Progress, Done)
- Tasks displayed as draggable cards in their respective columns
- Quick status change via drag-and-drop between columns
- Status badge on each task showing current status with color coding
